#summary MacVim-KaoriYaのビルド方法

= Gitリポジトリからビルドする =

http://github.com/splhack/macvim

{{{
git clone git://github.com/splhack/macvim.git
cd macvim
git checkout -b master origin/master
}}}

https://github.com/b4winckler/macvim/wiki/Building や
https://github.com/splhack/homebrew-splhack/blob/master/Library/Formula/macvim-kaoriya.rb#L18-29 を参照

= !HomeBrewでビルドする =

https://github.com/splhack/homebrew-splhack

  * https://github.com/splhack/homebrew-splhack/blob/master/Library/Formula/cmigemo.rb
  * https://github.com/splhack/homebrew-splhack/blob/master/Library/Formula/ctags-objc-ja.rb
  * https://github.com/splhack/homebrew-splhack/blob/master/Library/Formula/macvim-kaoriya.rb

ビルド

{{{
brew install --HEAD macvim-kaoriya
}}}
